text: George Henry Atkinson III (November 29, 1992 â€“ December 2, 2019) was an American professional football player. He was a running back in the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Notre Dame. He signed with the Oakland Raiders as an undrafted free agent in 2014, and also played for the Cleveland Browns, the Kansas City Chiefs, and the New York Jets. Atkinson III died on December 2, 2019 at the age of 27. ==References== ==Other websites== * Notre Dame Fighting Irish bio * Oakland Raiders bio Category:1992 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players Category:New York Jets players Category:Sportspeople from Oakland, California
title: George Atkinson III
